name: air_conditioner_remote_control
description: Simulates the basic functionality of an air conditioner remote control, allowing to turn on/off, set temperature, and change modes.

inputs.name: power
inputs.description: Turns the air conditioner on (True) or off (False).

inputs.name: temperature
inputs.description: Sets the desired temperature in Celsius.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: Sets the operation mode of the air conditioner.

inputs.name: fan_speed
inputs.description: Sets the fan speed of the air conditioner.

output.description: Returns the current state of the air conditioner with all settings.

exceptions.condition: Temperature is outside the allowed range (16-30).
Invalid mode or fan speed is provided.

examples.description: Normal case, turns on the air conditioner with specified settings.
Turns off the air conditioner, other settings remain at defaults.
Temperature is below the minimum allowed, raises ValueError.
